name: The Deals Point
overview:
The Deals Point is creating an online and mobile platform to help corporates get the best benefits for their employees by bringing exclusive offers from merchants in one platform. Corporate employees get special privileges and merchants get access to the right audience.

We are creating a product that is the not just about deals but a more comprehensive platform giving corporate employees a one stop to go for all their needs.

We have already got clients like HCL, Ericsson, Schneider, AC Nielsen, Evalueserve among others. The founding team consists of experienced people from the internet and technology industry having earned the degrees from ISB, IIT and NIT
